page.title: 03 PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content:
We went to{Moss Road First School.}We asked thirty-two children, under the age of eight to answer som questions. This is a table of what games they play and how many play each game.
Chase 22 Skipping 14 Passy 20 Handstands 13 Conkers 18 Chocolate 12 Hidi Bow 18 Horses 11 Bulldog 18 Schools 11 Football 18 Cowboys and Indians 9 Marbles 17 Mums and Dads 7 Racing 17 Dollies 6 The game I am going to explain is {Bulldog.}One person is on and the rest are in a line. The one who is on shouts a name, and that person has to get past the one who is on. When that person shouts{Bulldog}the rest try to pass without getting tug.
